ObjectClass.Name: Humbolt (Sepipod)
ObjectClass.Description:
HUMBOLT/SEPIPOD: Tactical air superiority biofighter-bomber Good scout, raider, and intercepter Weapons use regenerating Ammo
Progens adv. octo and pharo units Detects cloaked units Can deploy Chronobomb (req. Specials)

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location\ \Move Speed: 9 (aircraft)\Vision Range: 25, Aggro Radius: 40

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack target or Attack-Move to location\1/3X rate-of-fire when Ammo is empty \[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs ]\Gnd: 60 (-40), R 15, SR 2, Sta C\Air: 60 (-40), R 15, SR 2, Sta C

Objective.Name: Patrol
Objective.Details: Hold CTRL and select up to 5 points to\continuously patrol around\Target one of your own units to HOLD\current position or select a single\location to HOLD that position

Objective.Name: Change Commander
Objective.Details: Set an Arcticus as commander or set\target's Arcticus as own commander

Objective.Name: Remove from Heirarchy
Objective.Details: Remove from command hierarchy\ \Disconnect from commander

Objective.Name: Lead group
Objective.Details: \Take lead of everyone that\reports to this unit's Arcticus

Objective.Name: Deploy Chrono-Bomb
Objective.Details: Not Available \ Requires the Specials Tech upgrade

Objective.Name: Regenerate Shields
Objective.Details: \Fully restores shields\ \Process duration: 20 s\Avoid using near combat

Objective.Name: Deploy Chrono-Bomb
Objective.Details: Randomly chronoports all nearby enemies\30 to 120 s into the future\Radius: 16

Objective.Name: Factory/Progeneration
Objective.Details: Creates -pod- and -ligo-class units\when near another -pod-class\progenerator; when placed near\- Pharopod: progenerate Octo(-ligo) units\- Octopod: progenerate Pharo(-ligo) units

Objective.Name: Factory/Progeneration
Objective.Details: Creates -pod- and -ligo-class units\when near another -pod-class\progenerator; when placed near\- Pharopod: progenerate Octo(-ligo) units\- Octopod: progenerate Pharo(-ligo) units

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Chronoport to location in time\ \Must not have a TSS\Recharges Shields 50%

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Not Available\Must upgrade Chronoporting\in Reaph building

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: \Teleport to a specified location\ Must be near a Teleporter

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Chronoport to location in time\ \Must not have a TSS\Recharges Shields 50%
